kpi_info.title: RRC RE-ESTABLISH FAIL UE RT
kpi_info.use: The number of failed RRC connection re-establishments due to the UE replying with an RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION FAILURE message, for UEs with at least one RT RAB. UPDATED: When the RNC receives an RRC: RADIO BEARER RECONFIGURATION FAILURE message from the UE after a CELL UPDATE procedure with the cause "Radio link failure" and the UE has got at least one RT RAB.
